What else is there?

Packed with features

Bold News is a WordPress theme exclusively built for news, magazine and any news oriented website, whether it’s sport, fashion or trendy. It is fully responsive, retina ready and easy to customize.

Customize your layout

Use many header, menu, content and footer layout options, which you can combine in any manner desirable.

Menus & headers

Whether you’d like to stand out with dark or light header, reposition the menu or add widgets, you can do it with ease.

Bold Builder

Bold Builder is easy to use next generation visual page builder, optimized for speed and ease of use.

Color variations

Bold News offers you to play around with your own color schemes, by using accent and alternate color. Make it pop!

Article layouts

Our theme comes with many options of article layouts – background, top image, side, no image, different sizes and much more.

WP Customizer

Bold News theme options panel is powered by native WordPress Customizer, so you can change any setting easy & quickly.

Typography

With more than 500 Google fonts, you can pick up any font combination you’d like and make your site really stand out.

Custom Icons

Bold News comes with fully packed custom icons support. Font Awesome, Icon Stroke as well many more of our own.

Fully responsive

Bold News responds elegantly to various screen sizes and has been tested to work across devices – from desktop to smartphones.

WooCommerce

A shop is already included in the theme and you can set it up easy for any of the website you need, with all pages set up.

Translation ready

Bold News is created with best translation practices in mind and already contains .pot language file for easier translation.

Child theme ready

All of the functions and templates in Bold News theme have been setup so that they can be easily overwritten by a child theme.

New WP themes are in production

Subscribe to Bold Themes newsletter to get a notification once a new WP theme is online. We promise not to spam!

    Excellent user reviews

    High response time 24/7 and readiness to go the extra mile to satisfy your needs shows in the excellent user reviews.

    studioZ2

    May 2016

    For the redesign of our local news sites we were looking for a new theme for over 3 months. Decided on Bold News Theme because of the features (flexible customization options – re: bold builder) and the great design (selling point!). Promising options for development and quite impressive speed results were counting too. Despite that decision to purchase was based on great design, the main reason for our rating is very responsive support – requested NEW features have been implemented over few days (filtering via custom taxonomy) and the Bold team is very open to suggestions on developing the product. So the experience with the product itself as well as with relation with author is a prime one. Really enjoying it and hoping for an extensive development of the theme ;).

    Despite getting used to the new builder tool (vs Visual Composer) this theme works extremely well for my client. It loads very quickly and the I like the sidebar for categories. As a newbie designer there are some things I wish would be easier like a Main Theme options in the WP Dashboard vs having it in Customize area. But i highly recommend their customer support because of their prompt response time and helpfulness! Thank you BoldThemes!

    JoshofAllTrades

    May 2016

    Inluk

    June 2016

    Beautiful-looking theme with loads of options to personalise to our specific needs. We are yet to go live with our first site, but our initial impressions are all very positive and we are confident it will look far superior to the theme we currently use. The developers have also been very helpful and we look forward to building multiple sites with Bold News over the next year.

    Save time,
    use Bold Builder!

    Best practices on the market collected in one page builder

    Comes integrated with Bold News theme. Features drag and drop interface, loads of content elements, clipboard functionality and has the fastest user interface around. By far.

    Give it a try and let us know how YOU feel about it – visit its page on WordPress.org.
